gen:link.msg:message: FATAL ERROR: In table [660-27] S1705 should be equal to S1702+S1703+S1704 with margin of error [1] {{abs([660-27:R17C5|RPC=Reporting period] ({$a}) - [660-27:R17C2|RPC=Reporting period] ({$b}) + [660-27:R17C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$c}) + [660-27:R17C4|RPC=Reporting period] ({$d})) <= 1}}
